name: CyberRussia 2080
description:
Enter the dystopian world of CyberRussia!

Experince expreme censorship, misery and despair in a funny, ironic way.

Help b-tard protagonist Slavka become a successful person.

WASD - walk

Left Shift - run

LMB - Interaction, next slide
